free: #e We'll go to school tomorrow; this is announced at our meeting last night.
#c 我們明天要去學校，我們昨天晚上開會說的。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #n 根據噶瑪蘭的傳統，砍香蕉樹前要先拜拜，主要的儀式包括倒酒、喝酒以及跟祖先請示。
#n 根據噶瑪蘭的傳統，砍香蕉樹前要先拜拜，主要的儀式包括倒酒、喝酒以及跟祖先請示。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #n sinsi在此是指織布的領班。
#e I told them that they should bring bananas for cutting and that they should also bring wine. For pouring wine, I told this to the leader last night.
#c 我跟他們講要帶香蕉，要砍香蕉樹，還要帶酒。要倒酒的，我昨天跟領班說了。
#n sinsi在此是指織布的領班。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e We should come early at o'clock tomorrow; there are people from Taipei.
#c 我們明天八點早點來，有從台北來的人。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e (They come) to see us and take pictures.
#c （他們）來看我們、照相。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e A: (To see us) cut banana trees? I: Four girls and two boys.
#c A:（來看我們）砍香蕉樹的嗎? I:四個女孩子兩個男的。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e A: Who is going to bark banana trees? Is that you?
#c A: 是誰要削香蕉樹皮？是你嗎？

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e I don't know who is going to teach the children (i.e. the students from Taipei).
#c 我不知道是誰要去教小孩子（台北來的學生）。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e A: It's you who will teach the children. I: I'll teach the children to bark banana trees. A: Um... I: After cutting down banana trees, peel off the bark.
#c A:我要教小孩子削香蕉樹皮。 I:就是你要去教小孩子。 A:嗯... I:先把香蕉樹砍好，再削樹皮。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e After barking banana trees, dry the bark and braid...bark...tear the bark into threads, and then braid the threads.
#c 剝完香蕉樹皮後，把樹皮曬乾然後接結...削樹皮...分線絲，然後接結。
#n 曬乾後應該是先分線絲然後才接線。
#n sinas是指將曬乾後的樹皮撕成一條一條的細線。
#n nutuz是指把從樹皮撕下來的線絲接在一起。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #n 此處sanis應改為sinas才對。

free: #e [Translation missing] A: How could you (braid the threads) without drying (the bark) first? I: I'll take the dried (bark). I: The dried (bark) is for barking. I: I'll take the dried (bark). A: Are you the only elder?
#c [翻譯漏失] A:還沒曬乾怎麼（弄線）呢？ I:我要拿曬乾的。 A:乾的是要用來削樹皮的。 I:我要拿曬乾的。 A:只有你一個老人家嗎？

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)

free: #e (I'll) take the ball of banana threads and (teach students) to do so.
#c (我)會拿用香蕉樹皮撕下的線做成的線球，（教學生）就這樣弄。

free: #e A: Um. I: This is the ball of banana threads.
#c A:嗯。 I:這個就是用香蕉樹皮撕下的線做成的線球。

free: #e A: Um. I: This is to be seen there tomorrow.
#c A:嗯。 I:明天在那邊的時候要看的。

#n qatuRuza-an s<m>udad ni: 沒那麼快寫完

free: #e A: Can you finish it immediately? I: After finishing this, we'll wind threads onto the loom.
#c A:你可以馬上做完嗎？ I:做完了的時候，我們會把線纏繞在織布機上。

free: #e A: Bring the tool for winding threads onto the loom. I: There are two looms there. A: -- I: We'll weave there.
#c A:帶用來將線繞在織布機上的工具。 I:那邊有兩台織布機。 A: -- I:我們在那邊織布。

free: #e A: Will the students practice weaving? I: They wound threads onto the loom. A: Have you taught students before?
#c A:那些學生要練習織布嗎？I: 他們把線繞在織布機上。 A:之前你有教過學生嗎？

free: #e I: I didn't teach them the complete process (I only taught them by halves). A: Will the students take away what we've woven? I: There are two bolts of cloth and they'll take them away tomorrow.
#c I: 沒有教的很完整（一半一半的教）。 A: 我們編的東西學生要帶走嗎？ I:做完的布有兩個，他們明天要帶走。

free: #e A:-- I: I'll bring the banana bark which I started to do in the morning.
#c A: -- I:我要帶早上開始做的香蕉。

meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e Where will you chop banana trees?
#c 在哪裡砍香蕉樹？

meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e At Utai's place?
#c 潘武郎那邊嗎？
#n panbulung是潘武郎，族名為utai。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e In back of the school kitchen.
#c 在學校廚房的後面。

free: #e There are (banana trees) in back of (the school kitchen). A: Aren't they planted by Asing?
#c 有（香蕉樹）啊，在（學校廚房）後面。 A:不是Asing種的嗎?

free: #e Those (banana trees planted by) students (belong to) the school. Those at this place (belong to) ...... Banday.
#c 學生種的學校管，這邊的是這個...那個...偕萬來的。

#c I:池塘下面的。 A:是偕萬來的香蕉樹嗎？可能在那邊砍香蕉樹。

#c A:要拿給他們看的香蕉原來是這種的。 I:要在那邊編織的話，有香蕉樹。

free: #e I told (the students) thus.
#c 我這樣講（給那些大學生聽）。

free: #e A: How many people from Taipei will come? I: I don't know how many people are told (to come). Only one child (will come).
#c A:多少台北人要來？ I:叫幾個人(來)不知道。 A:就只有一個那個小孩子要來。
#n tingaR-an-ku ti-buya pa-qawtu：我叫buya來。

#c 我們看看。

free: #e There is Raciang, and who... A: There will be Raciang for sure. If there is no one to introduce (i.e. translate) what we say, people from Taipei cannot understand it.
#c 有潘金英，還有誰... A:一定有潘金英。沒有介紹我們的語言的話（翻譯我們的語言），台北的人就不會知道。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e You speak Kavalan. There must be an interpreter.
#c 你講噶瑪蘭，要有人翻譯。

free: #e I: I don't know it's Bunsin or someone else that will translate (what we said). A: Translate... I: Translate what I said. A: To make people of Southern Min understand (what I say). I: We cut in that way and bark banana trees in this way. A: It must be Raciang, I think. I: She is eloquent. A: It must be Raciang, who can translate what we say. I: Perhaps.
#c I: 是Bunsin還是誰要翻譯不知道。 A:翻譯...。 I:翻譯我講的話。 A:給閩南人聽。 I:就是這樣剪，這樣刮樹皮。 A:我想一定是Raciang。 I:她很會講話。 A:一定是Raciang，她會翻譯我們的話。 I:可能是那樣。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e A: -- I: After finishing the job, I don’t know what we’re going to do?
#c A: -- I:做完了，還有什麼工作？

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e We'll bring wine, after finishing weaving in one day or half a day. I don't know what to do.
#c 我們會帶酒，在一天或半天內編織完後，我不知道要做什麼。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e XXX. A: After finishing the job, you'll surely take pictures. I: (We'll) take pictures. A: After finishing the job, you'll drink wine and perhaps have lunch.
#c XXX。 A:工作完成後，一定會照相。 I:一定會照相。 A:工作結束後，你們會喝酒，可能也會吃午餐。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e I have no idea. They didn't tell us.
#c 不知道,沒有講

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e There must be rice for you to eat.
#c 一定有給你們吃的飯。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e They didn't tell us how many people there will be.
#c 沒有講那邊有幾個人。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e A: -- I: They didn't say how many people got the job. A: At eight o’clock?
#c A: -- I:沒有講有幾個拿那個工作的人。 A:八點嗎？

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e "You have to come at eight," he said.
#c 他說，「八點你們就要來」。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e A: -- I: [Translation missing] A: XXX. SyuRwa just came.
#c A: -- I: [翻譯漏失] A: XXX。SyuRwa剛才有來。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e She told me, 'Come (to my place) tomorrow morning. We're going to hang my father's photo (on the wall). Come earlier at eight tomorrow morning.'
#c 她說，「明天要來，我們要把爸爸的相片掛上去，早上八點早一點來。」
#n 根據噶瑪蘭的傳統，一定要請巫師掛過世的人的相片，家屬不能自己掛。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e I'll take my things over there.
#c 我要拿著我的東西去那邊（之後就可以直接到學校）。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e I'll hang (the photo on the wall first) so that I can go to school afterwards.
#c （照片）掛上去了，我才可以去學校。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e You go there first to pour wine for Waq and you may go to school afterwards.
#c 你先到那邊拜Waq，才可以去學校。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e That's it.
#c 就是那樣。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e (How come they) hang the photo immediately?
#c 那麼快就要掛上去？

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e (They) don't have the custom of (hanging the photo after) forty days.
#c 沒有四十天的規定。
#n 有信教會的才有四十天後才掛相片的規定。

meta.language: 噶瑪蘭語, Kavalan, Xinshe (新社)
meta.speaker: 潘天利, Abas, male, 1933

free: #e A: -- I: They did it informally. They held the funeral in Kavalan's way, so they don't have such a custom.
#c A: -- I:他們隨便弄。當初葬禮是用噶瑪蘭的，沒有信什麼（四十天的規定）。
